title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project is not.
EB: The Open Project and Close Project menu items should both be available when multiple projects are selected in the Navigator.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create two projects P1 and P2. 2. Select P2. 3. Attempt to close P2 and observe that the Close Project menu item is missing.
